website_summaries.verdict: A terrific bookshelf for those who refuse to sacrifice fashion for function.
pros: Simple to assemble in just minutes
Strong, sturdy bookshelf does not require any wall mounting
Stunning finish makes the bookshelf a sleek addition in any living space
Five spacious shelves make it easy to store or display a variety of items
cons: Not as tall as comparable corner bookshelves

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bookcase with the intention of painting it but when it came it was so nice I didn't want to paint it at all! Easy to put together (I'm 7 months pregnant and my 2 year old "helped" and we had it done in less than half an hour. It's quite tippy so you'd definitely need to use the screws that screw it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: High-Klass

customer_reviews.title: Just what she needed
customer_reviews.text: Item was just what my daughter wanted for her small dining room . Her fiancé and her ended up bolting iit to wall and raising it higher
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I found this cabinet to be quite well-made and sturdy. I didn't have any trouble putting it together, and I was pleasantly surprised by the appearance. I guess I wasn't expecting very much! The finish is a textured grey-ash vinyl veneer with some brown variation. I knocked one star because there are visible holes where there aren't any screws and it is a bit expensive for the material.
customer_reviews.author: aretephora

customer_reviews.title: Crappy hardware
customer_reviews.text: The metal parts to keep the shelves together are to cheap that one little turn broke each one and I couldn't lock the shelves in place. I had to use other screws from home depot to go right through the side of my shelf to keep it together. It also was unbalanced and crooked. Which also could have had something to do with the crappy screws.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcee Wilmeth

customer_reviews.title: Rustic in appearance and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a very sturdy shelf and I think its alot prettier in person. It does have an old timey feel about it. I love the rounded front. My Husband drilled 2 large holes behind the center of 2 shelves. I have lamps on them and wanted to run the cords through the back. Its perfect, all around!
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA VICK

customer_reviews.title: Looks good for small it’s or photos
customer_reviews.text: Looks great ! I have 8x10 photos with a smaller 4x6 on the shelf and has some space over it. Matches our other grey barn wood stuff good.
customer_reviews.author: brookegreenlee

customer_reviews.title: Good size, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our nursery! My husband put it together in no time and it looks great! It also doesn’t take up too much space which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Banks

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy little shelf
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect in the corner of my kitchen. Exactly what I needed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again but will do the job!
customer_reviews.text: Not terrible to assemble... however one of the plastic screw sockets was the wrong size so we had to manually carve it out to get the screw to fit. And one of the cam locks broke without forcing it. Cheap materials but will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Quality for low price
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty sturdy & good quality for the low price. Used as a shelf in my sons bedroom and fits nice and compactly hot holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Kinzel

customer_reviews.title: I wouldnt do it again
customer_reviews.text: Not as happy as I was hoping to be. Material wasn't as strong... one of the shelf anchors went through the side...smaller than expected, especially for the price. And darker colored than expected. I wouldn't pay more than $25 each honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Marohl

customer_reviews.title: Absoultly great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love this corner shelf! My amazing son put it together, right before school! Took him about 1 hour. FAST SHIPPING!!!!! I definitely recommend this beautiful piece! Amazing price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Denise DiTusa

customer_reviews.title: Not great with baseboards
customer_reviews.text: Medium difficulty putting it together. Great height and color. Image shows it with a baseboard but I find it’s not steady against corner with baseboards- hard to anchor due to baseboards.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of this shelf...has that 'smokiness/wornish' look to it. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmik1217

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Assembly Pieces
customer_reviews.text: The wood was good quality, however the parts for assembly are extremely cheap and about half of the tightening pieces broke with very little force tightening them. Probably cheap aluminum. Item is not worth the price and you’re better off with IKEA furniture.
customer_reviews.author: reiley clark

customer_reviews.title: lisa
customer_reviews.text: I love this book shelf and it was so easy for me to put it together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: While the book case seems well made, it didn't come with instructions so the assembly is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my room
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped quickly and was just as pictured. It was packaged well and I had everything necessary to put it together. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dog walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great value for the money, takes 15-20 to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Burger

customer_reviews.title: I love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! Perfect for my small apartment living room. Only down fall was the directions were no help... my husband had to figure it out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality, smooth nice wood surface
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality, smooth nice wood surface, stable and pretty. Just a bit expensive than similar items. But if you love your house, the purchase should be worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Xinmeng Yu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item. I couldn't find anything like it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item. I couldn't find anything like it! It was easy to put together and it looks very sturdy. They also include screws to fasten it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: RAWR

customer_reviews.title: Good solid shelf
customer_reviews.text: It came well packaged. Good solid shelf. Just a little shorter than expected, but still satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice color that blends in to the surrounding
customer_reviews.text: This piece fit right in to the rest if the room.. it was made for this corner! It has a nice color that blends in to the surrounding. The size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: shelf length is great. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my kitchen corner. Very strudy, shelf length is great. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf it was exactly what I was looking for😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's darker than I thought. Came with some damage ...
customer_reviews.text: It's darker than I thought. Came with some damage on the corners. I think the board itself looks strong, but the surface is glued on (or a sticker). Since there's too much trouble to return it, so I decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Poor installation
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift and the precut holes for the camlocks and wooden rods don’t line up for both side panels.
customer_reviews.author: Stosh

product_meta.title: Kings Brand Furniture Wood Wall Corner 5 Tier Bookshelf Display Stand, Grey
product_meta.description: Kings Brand Grey Finish Wood Wall Corner 5 Tier Bookshelf Display Stand. This remarkably unique grey finish corner bookcase fits into the corner of any room. Offering plenty of storage for your favorite novels while taking up as little space as possible. Dimension: 12" x 12" x 64".Simple assembly required.
feature_bullets: Kings Brand Grey Finish Wood Wall Corner 5 Tier Bookshelf Display Stand
This remarkably unique grey finish corner bookcase fits into the corner of any room
Offering plenty of storage for your favorite novels while taking up as little space as possible
